PersonalStatement.text: Brittany Vega, born on 1971-08-25, is a Male based in Sierraburgh, Grenada. He is Single and holds Israeli nationality. Currently working at Flores, Calderon and Crane.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Hogan-Rosales from 2012 to 2016.
Senior Data Analyst at Flores, Calderon and Crane, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Ritsumeikan Asia Pacific University
Master's in Engineering from Chandigarh University
